sentence: Avon Products, Inc. ( AVP ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 12, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.06 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 02, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased AVP stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 8th quarter that AVP has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $13.7, the dividend yield is 1.75%.
The previous trading day's last sale of AVP was $13.7, representing a -40.07% decrease from the 52 week high of $22.86 and a 7.03% increase over the 52 week low of $12.80.
AVP is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
AVP's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.51.
Zacks Investment Research reports AVP's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as -20.37%, compared to an industry average of 12.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the AVP Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
